short_summary: Specialized DNA Library Services for Oat and Barley
description: Objective of the ACAN: A service contract until March 31, 2023 with Laval University for the preparation of sequencing-ready DNA-barcoded complexity-reduced “GbS” libraries prepared from customer-supplied DNA samples for the Ottawa RDC. Suppliers’ right to submit a Statement of Capabilities: Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described herein, may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this Notice on or before the closing date of this Notice.
